gallery-neon.description: Overrides Y.Node.show() to make it look like a flickering neon sign.
gallery-neon.name: gallery-neon

Plugin.Neon.name: Plugin.Neon

constructors.description: Overrides Y.Node.show() to make it look like a flickering neon sign.

easing.description: The easing to apply to the color animation.

textColor.description: Text (ending) color.  Must be parseable by Y.Color.toRGB().

flickerCount.description: The number of flickers before the text stays visible.

backgroundColor.description: Background (starting) color.  Must be parseable by Y.Color.toRGB().

textShadow.description:
Text shadow *template* for setting text-shadow CSS3 property.  Use
{color} to mark where color should be inserted.

Plugin.Neon.description: Overrides Y.Node.show() to make it look like a flickering neon sign.
